title: User Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
summary: Implement a secure login system with multi-factor authentication and role-based access management.
description: Build a robust authentication and authorization system that allows customers to securely log in using multi-factor authentication. Implement role-based access control to ensure users only see information and services relevant to their roles. Integrate with the bank’s identity management framework and enforce security compliance through session management, token validation, and secure credential storage.

title: Responsive User Interface Development
summary: Design and develop a responsive, accessible, and user-friendly interface across all devices.
description: Develop a modern, intuitive, and responsive portal UI that provides a consistent user experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile platforms. Incorporate accessibility best practices, intuitive navigation, and visually cohesive design patterns to enhance user satisfaction and engagement.

title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
summary: Develop a dashboard showing personalized banking products and services based on user profile and eligibility.
description: Design a personalized dashboard that automatically presents relevant banking products, account details, and service options based on customer data and eligibility rules. Ensure real-time data retrieval and dynamic rendering for a seamless personalized experience.

title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Implement streamlined workflows for account opening and service changes.
description: Build guided workflows to allow customers to open new accounts or modify existing services through a minimal-click process. Integrate with internal workflow engines for automated routing, validation checks, and backend processing while ensuring compliance and auditability.

title: Application Draft Management and Document Uploads
summary: Enable saving incomplete applications and uploading supporting documents securely.
description: Implement a draft management feature allowing customers to save partial applications and resume them later. Provide secure document upload functionality supporting multiple file types. Ensure encryption, virus scanning, and storage compliance with corporate data handling policies.

title: Real-Time Notifications and Email Alerts
summary: Provide instant status updates and email notifications for all customer actions.
description: Develop a real-time notification system that sends immediate updates about submitted requests, approvals, and required actions through in-portal alerts and email. Maintain reliable message queues, configurable triggers, and delivery audit mechanisms to ensure transparency and timely communication.

title: Interaction and Transaction History Tracking
summary: Maintain a secure and auditable history of all user activities and transactions.
description: Implement a comprehensive activity and transaction history system that records all interactions and service requests by customers. Provide clear and filtered views for customers to review past actions while ensuring audit compliance, encryption, and secure archival of sensitive information.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate portal services seamlessly with existing core banking systems.
description: Develop robust API and middleware integrations to connect the self-service portal with the bank’s core banking systems. Ensure reliable synchronization of customer data, account information, and transaction statuses across systems. Design integration modules for scalability, high availability, and error resilience.

title: Portal Database and Security Framework
summary: Establish a dedicated portal database ensuring high performance and data security.
description: Create a dedicated data management framework for the portal to optimize performance and isolate customer data from the core system. Implement robust encryption, monitoring, and database access policies. Ensure compliance with data protection regulations and conduct regular performance and security audits.
